name: The Ratz
description:
Laurat and Pipas can’t catch a break. The shady owners of the hotel they live in, the Ratz, refuse to repair the pipes. So they’ll do the job. Taping, fixing and spitting their way through life, the roommates will have to cooperate if they want to keep a decent home.

Play as one of the two self employed janitors, and make sure everyone get some water. Customers are quick to complain, and sanitary controls are even quicker to show up, so keep the water flowing.
